name: Snake Classic - 1997
description:
The pursuit of classic, pay tribute to the classic!
Snake, the classic could not be more classic game.

Classic mode, authentic classic play, guaranteed to make you put it down!
Challenge mode, if you are a master, dashing challenge mode!

- Authentic classic snake gameplay.
- 2 game modes.
- 5 challenge levels designed.
- Distinctive game map.
- Fun and challenging.

If you have a new play suggestions or comments, please Comments "universal program ape" must be able to meet your every need!
